title: Kerala for All conclave: Kerala is a fort against religious polarisation, says N. Ram

title: Budget 2026: Odisha, T.N., Andhra, Kerala to get dedicated rare earth corridors to promote research and mining

title: Navjot Kaur Sidhu quits Congress, takes dig at Punjab party chief
content: She criticised Punjab Congress president Amarinder Singh Raja Warring, blaming him for “damaging the organisation” and blamed him of “selling the party for petty gains with an understanding with AAP”

title: India’s only Chinatown in Kolkata, fading away
content: The Chinese community in Kolkata now has only about 2,000 people, down from about 50,000 in the 1960s. In the SIR process in West Bengal 389 of 484 voters have been categorised as untraceable or absent. For a community that began coming to the city since the 1840s, and has dealt with racism in many forms, the dwindling numbers in the SIR are a reflection of many leaving the country, reports Shrabana Chatterjee

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Centre must fulfil promises to Kerala, including AIIMS, says Shashi Tharoor
content: The Congress MP also said unemployment was another major concern facing the country and hoped the budget would include measures to tackle it.

title: Expect Union Budget to give fresh momentum to Delhi’s development, says Delhi CM

title: Union Budget 2026 LIVE: Budget proposes to set up ₹10,000 crore to create champion SMEs: FM Sitharaman
content: FM Sitharaman proposes to support mineral rich states of Odisha, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu to establish critical mineral facilities; the FM also proposes to top up Self Reliance India Fund with ₹4,000 cr in FY27 to support MSMEs

title: Firing outside film maker Rohit Shetty’s Mumbai residence, probe underway
content: The police were examining CCTV footage from around the building to identify the accused and establish the sequence of events

title: If firm profits more from its scale, it has to bear more responsibility for environmental costs: Supreme Court
content: Observing that bigger operations signify a bigger footprint, the top court said a larger scale often means more resource use, more emissions and more waste, leading to more environmental stress

title: Murals based on Tamil culture beneath Madhya Kailash flyover to add to art on OMR
content: Sources in the Highways Department said that the murals were chosen from the arts - literature, music, and theatre reflecting Tamil culture

title: Part of Rajiv Gandhi Salai shut over sewer line repairs
content: A former Highways engineer said that this was the fourth time that sinking had occured at various locations on Rajiv Gandhi Salai due to the same sewer line

title: Sonam Wangchuk taken to AIIMS Jodhpur
content: The Supreme Court directs jail authorities to arrange specialist treatment after his counsel flags persistent stomach pain due to the water quality in jail

title: Indian Coast Guard gears up for 50th Raising Day ceremony
content: Aligned with the vision of ‘Aatmanirbhar Bharat’ and ‘Make in India’, the ICG is steadily moving towards self-reliance through the induction of indigenously-built ships, aircraft, helicopters, and advanced surveillance systems, while simultaneously prioritising infrastructure development and personnel welfare, the ICG said in a statement

title: In place of BNSS, CrPC is still being used in Jharkhand, says former Congress MLA Amba Prasad
content: She pointed out that a ‘dead law’ is still being used in official government documents throughout the state, and ironically, everyone, from the administration to the opposition, is silent.

title: El Nino on the horizon during monsoon months

title: Malayalam theatre steals the spotlight at ITFoK

title: Truck driven on wrong side crushes five bikers to death in Odisha
content: The accident occurred on the Gosain Nuagaon overbridge when the speeding truck ploughed into traffic, crushing five bike riders under its wheels; eight injured persons were rushed to a nearby hospital, where the condition of two was reported to be critical

title: Economic Survey confirms distress under BJP government: Kharge
content: The Congress president targets the BJP over the decline in manufacturing growth, youth unemployment, rising trade deficit, and weakening household finances

title: India To Develop 7 High-Speed Rail Corridors: Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget
content: Presenting the Union Budget 2026-27 in Parliament, Nirmala Sitharaman said India will develop seven high-speed rail corridors between key cities.

title: Tax Holiday For Data Centres, Simplified Tax Regime For Corporates: Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget -
content: Nirmala Sitharaman announced increased capex of Rs 12.2 lakh crore for FY27 with total government expenditure set at Rs 53.5 lakh crore. Estimated FY27 net tax receipts were set at Rs 28.7 lakh crore. Estimated fiscal deficit is 4.3 per cent of GDP.

title: In Big IT, AI Push, Firms Setting Up Data Centres In India To Get Tax Holiday
content: Giving a big push to the growth of information technology and artificial intelligence in India, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman has announced a tax holiday till 2047 for companies providing cloud services by setting up data centres in the country

title: India To Set Up Textile Parks, Mahatma Gandhi Gram Samaj Initiative To Support Khadi: Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Union Budget 2026-27: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Sunday placed a special spotlight on India's traditional craft sector by announcing the Mahatma Gandhi Gram Swaraj initiative, a major effort aimed at strengthening Khadi and handloom

title: AI Tools To Help, Advise Farmers To Reduce Risks: Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget
content: Nirmala Sitharaman in her speech further highlighted the government's focus on strengthening agricultural diversification and rural livelihoods.

title: New Panel To Review Impact Of AI On Services Sector: Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman today announced a new committee to review the impact of new technology like Artificial Intelligence (AI) on India's services sector.

title: NRIs Can Now Invest In Indian Stocks Via Portfolio Investment Scheme
content: The Portfolio Investment Scheme (PIS) allows non-resident Indians and foreign investors to buy and sell Indian stocks through a special bank account approved by the RBI.

title: Sitharaman Announces Rare Earth Corridors In 4 States, Including Tamil Nadu
content: Taking a big step to reduce India's dependence on China for rare earths, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced that dedicated corridors will be set up for the minerals in four states - Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Odisha and Andhra Pradesh.

title: Budget 2026 'Yuva Shakti' Driven, Inspired By 3 'Kartavyas': Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Presenting her ninth consecutive budget, Nirmala Sitharaman said many youngsters had shared innovative ideas with Prime Minister Narendra Modi during the Viksit Bharat' young leaders' dialogue 2026.

title: Rs 40,000 Crore For SemiConductor Push, Says Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Presenting the Union Budget 2026 today, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a Rs 40,000 crore outlay for semiconductors.

title: With 9th Consecutive Budget, N Sitharaman Becomes Longest Serving Finance Minister
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Sunday makes history as she presents a record ninth consecutive Budget that is expected to unveil measures to sustain growth momentum, maintain fiscal discipline.

title: Budget 2026 Live Updates: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman Presents Union Budget 2026
content: Union Budget 2026 Live Updates: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presents ninth consecutive budget.

title: Boy, 13, Murdered, Body Hidden In Bed Box, Grandmother Made To Sleep Above
content: In Madhya Pradesh's Indore, the chilling murder of a 13-year-old boy has stunned everyone. The suspect strangled the child eight times with a nylon rope, smashed his face with a brick, and then hid the body inside a bed box.

content: The airline described the move as "proactive" saying the aircraft was grounded to address the issue highlighted by the aviation regulator and undergo necessary corrective work.

content: The video shows the AI agent interacting with the user via phone and following his instructions to open YouTube on the computer.

content: FM Nirmala Sitharaman Speech: Nearly Rs 1 lakh crore has evaporated from the ITC's market value in a month as the stock plunged close to 20 per cent after the sharp cigarette tax hike unveiled in late December.

title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with Sabonis, Christi...
content: the febr. 5 trade deadline is set to expire . players like Domantas Sabonis and deandre Ayton are not living up to the hype . there are some smaller names of players heating up and bigger names of guys struggling or not fitting in with their teams .

title: Budget 2026: Odisha, Kerala, Andhra, Tamil Nadu to get dedicated rare earth corridors — what it means
content: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman has proposed dedicated rare earth corridors in Odisha, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala to boost domestic capabilities and reduce import dependence. The initiative, part of the 2026-27 Union Budget, aims to support mining, processing, and manufacturing of critical minerals essential for clean energy and defence.

title: IMF data puts India ahead of US in 2026 global real GDP growth; Elon Musk responds
content: India is set to lead global economic growth by 2026, surpassing the US, according to IMF data. Elon Musk highlighted this seismic shift, noting India and China will drive over 43% of worldwide expansion. This surge, fueled by domestic strength and manufacturing, signals a changing global economic landscape beyond traditional Western markets.

title: Railway Budget 2026: 7 high-speed rail corridors announced - check routes & other details
content: Railway Budget 2026 Live: "In order to promote environmentally sustainable passenger systems, we will develop seven high speed rail corridors between cities as growth collectors," FM Sitharaman announced.

title: Google cofounder makes biggest-ever public donation to tackle California housing crisis
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has made his largest public donation, contributing $20 million to a new coalition tackling California's housing crisis. This significant move, backed by other tech leaders, comes as the state's wealthy face a potential wealth tax. Brin's philanthropy has been substantial, with billions donated to various causes, including climate solutions and medical research.

title: Banking sector budget 2026: Nirmala Sitharaman announces ‘Banking for Viksit Bharat’ panel
content: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced measures to bolster India's financial sector, including a high-level committee to review banking for Viksit Bharat. The sector shows improved health with strong balance sheets and high profitability. Reforms also target NBFCs and aim to deepen the corporate bond market.

title: Nvidia H-1B data reveals US pay as Jensen Huang reviews all compensation
content: Nvidia's soaring stock has created millionaires among its employees, with H-1B visa filings revealing substantial base salaries for critical roles. While CEO Jensen Huang emphasizes personal involvement in compensation, earlier hires have significantly benefited from equity appreciation. The data offers a glimpse into the pay for engineers, architects, researchers, and product managers, excluding bonuses and equity.

title: From 'bahi-khata' to tablet: Tracing Sitharaman’s Union Budget journey since 2019
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman is set to present her ninth consecutive Union Budget on February 1, a historic Sunday sitting. Since 2019, her Budgets have marked milestones—from replacing the briefcase with a ‘bahi-khata’ to longest and shortest speeches—focusing on infrastructure, health, reforms, and inclusive growth. Budget 2026 is expected to boost AI, manufacturing, telecom, and shield the economy amid global trade frictions.

title: Gold, silver prices crash on Budget 2026 day! What’s causing the slide?
content: Gold and silver prices experienced a significant tumble on Sunday, hitting lower circuits after a historic crash on Friday. Profit-taking, a stronger US dollar, and speculation surrounding the US Federal Reserve's leadership, particularly the nomination of Kevin Warsh, fueled the sharp correction in precious metals.

title: Turning Point USA announces platforms for rival Super Bowl halftime show
content: After months of silence, Turning Point USA has finally confirmed how fans can watch its alternative Super Bowl LX halftime show. The broadcast will stream on YouTube, X, Rumble, and several conservative TV networks. While distribution details are now clear, Turning Point USA has not revealed performers or production plans, which still leaves viewers with the question of what they will see when they tune in.

title: New details in Ryan Wedding case as FBI links wife, associates to drug killings
content: Former Olympic snowboarder Ryan Wedding has pleaded not guilty to federal charges tied to drug trafficking and murder. US authorities say he led a billion-dollar drug ring uncovered through Operation Giant Slalom. Several alleged associates, including his wife, girlfriend, lawyer, and international partners, have been sanctioned, arrested, or face extradition, according to the FBI and US Department of Justice.

title: Gabrielle Union breaks silence on fertility issues with Dwyane Wade
content: Dwyane Wade and his wife, the popular actress Gabrielle Union, have had a beautiful and a healthy marriage ever since they tied the knot in 2014 after dating for a couple of years. While both Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union had been through divorce before, the popular actress did not have a biological child of her own unlike the NBA legend. As the two tried to expand their family, Gabrielle Union details the trauma she faced as she failed to conceive.

title: US-based woman watches mother being thrashed in Ghaziabad home, sends brother to jail
content: A 44-year-old man was arrested in Ghaziabad for allegedly assaulting his elderly mother. The incident was captured on a CCTV camera installed by his sister living abroad, who alerted neighbours and police after witnessing the brutal attack. Legal action has been initiated against the accused.

title: Budget 2026: Top 5 income tax expectations of salaried, middle class taxpayers
content: Last year, FM Sitharaman announced major changes in the new income tax regime, and while tax experts believe that there is little fiscal room in Budget 2026 for any big tax income tweaks, there is also a hope that some changes may be brought about to further boost consumption.

title: India vs Pak showdown: ICC reveals make-or-break scenario for U19 WCsemi-final
content: India face Pakistan in a crucial U-19 World Cup match. The winner secures a semi-final berth. India seeks revenge for a recent Asia Cup loss. Australia, Afghanistan, and England have already qualified. The game's outcome will determine the final semi-finalist. Pakistan needs a significant win to advance. India has a clearer path to qualification.

title: 'Looking to see what benefits Kerala gets': Tharoor ahead of Budget presentation
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor emphasized that the Union Budget must translate projected economic growth into job creation, warning that jobless growth offers no benefit to India's youth. He highlighted employment generation as a key expectation, especially with robust growth prospects flagged by the Economic Survey. States, including Kerala facing upcoming elections, are also keenly awaiting central government support.

title: 'I don't see Sanju Samson being part of the XI': Gavaskar drops big hint
content: Despite a lean patch, Sanju Samson failed to perform on his home ground in the fifth T20I against New Zealand. Ishan Kishan and Suryakumar Yadav then dominated, with Kishan scoring a rapid century. Sunil Gavaskar criticized Samson's form, suggesting he might miss out on the T20 World Cup XI.

title: Stock market trades in green on special Sunday session; Gold, Silver prices plunge
content: Benchmark indices tumbled sharply on Sunday as BSE Sensex dropped over 1,000 points and NSE Nifty50 dipped below 25,000. Gold and silver prices also crashed, hitting lower circuit levels ahead of the Union Budget 2026–27 presentation. Trading proceeded as usual on the weekend, a rare occurrence for Indian stock exchanges.

title: 'Will do something substantial': Trump warns Canada against China deal; negotiates with Iran
content: US President Trump warned Canada of substantial US action if it proceeds with a trade deal with China, stating it would lead to China taking over Canada. Meanwhile, Trump indicated Iran is in talks with the US, despite ongoing military deployments in the region, while Tehran issued warnings against any attack.

title: Tilak Varma to play warm-ups before T20 World Cup: Suryakumar Yadav
content: India receives a significant fitness boost ahead of the T20 World Cup with positive updates on Washington Sundar and Tilak Varma. Sundar has resumed batting and bowling during his rehabilitation, while Varma is nearing full fitness after surgery and is expected to join the squad soon.

title: Union Budget 2026: Change in FM Sitharaman’s Budget speech format? What Part B may now hold
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is poised to deliver a Union Budget 2026 with a significant shift, dedicating Part B to outlining India's long-term economic vision for investors. This section will move beyond traditional tax proposals to encompass near-term priorities, structural ambitions, and a strategic roadmap for boosting the nation's global standing amidst geopolitical uncertainties.

title: Russian crude out? Trump claims India to buy oil from Venezuela
content: President Trump said that India is poised to purchase Venezuelan oil, a move aligning with India's strategy to diversify its energy imports. This development follows Venezuela's legal reforms to attract private investment in its oil sector and recent discussions between Indian and Venezuelan leaders to strengthen bilateral ties.

title: Maharashtra dy CM Sunetra Pawar still facing scrutiny in Rs 25k cr bank scam
content: Maharashtra's Deputy CM Sunetra Pawar faces ongoing legal scrutiny in the Rs 25,000 crore MSCB scam, with the ED objecting to a clean chit.  She and Ajit Pawar were also investigated under Benami Properties law, with properties worth Rs 1,000 crore attached, though they later received relief. The scam involved rule violations in loan disbursements to cooperative sugar factories.

title: Right-wing group forces Dehradun Muslim trader to change shop name
content: Bajrang Dal members protested a Muslim trader's shop name in Kotdwar, demanding a change due to the term 'Baba'. The demonstration followed a viral video where a local fitness influencer, Deepak Kumar, defended the shopkeeper. Police have increased security, and the Bajrang Dal plans to file a complaint against Kumar.

title: Minor girl visiting temple with male friend gang-raped in forest
content: A 16-year-old girl was brutally assaulted by eight individuals, including a minor, after being waylaid near a temple in Narsinghpur. The attackers took her to a forest, raped her, and recorded the act.

title: Gunshots heard outside Rohit Shetty's Juhu residence in Mumbai
content: Police and forensic teams arrived at Director Rohit Shetty's residence and secured the premises for a detailed search of the premises after gunshot sounds were reportedly heard in the area.

title: Watch: Pak bowler under fire! Green’s angry reaction to Tariq goes viral
content: Pakistan beat Australia by 90 runs in the second T20I in Lahore, taking an unassailable 2-0 lead. Salman Agha scored 76 while Usman Khan added 53 as Pakistan posted 198-5. Controversy arose when Cameron Green accused Usman Tariq of chucking after his dismissal. Pakistan’s spinners dominated, bowling Australia out for 108, with Abrar Ahmed and Shadab Khan leading the charge.

title: LPG gas prices go up: Commercial cylinder to cost Rs 49 more from today
content: Commercial LPG prices have been revised upwards by Rs 49 for a 19-kg cylinder, bringing the Delhi price to Rs 1,740.50. This follows a previous Rs 111 increase, reversing a period of price relief for businesses. Domestic LPG cylinder prices remain unchanged.

title: Shailendra Singh says he paid Rs 4 cr to Amitabh Bachchan for Johnny Walker
content: Producer Shailendra Singh, known for backing National Award-winning films like Page 3 and Traffic Signal, has opened up about a long-standing dispute involving Amitabh Bachchan and filmmaker Shoojit Sircar over the unreleased film Shoebite. Singh claimed he had originally developed the story under the title Johnny Walker, which was later renamed Shoebite, and accused Shoojit of reselling the project to UTV’s Ronnie Screwvala despite him having already paid Bachchan an advance of Rs 4 crore.

title: Ram Charan and Upasana Konidela welcome twins; Chiranjeevi shares the happy news
content: Ram Charan and his wife Upasana Konidela are now parents of three. The couple welcomed twins—a baby boy and a baby girl—on Saturday, a development that was officially confirmed by Chiranjeevi on social media.

title: Pain that shows up at night: Doctor explains the strange pattern of pain that waits for the lights to go off
content: Nighttime pain is a common experience, often dismissed as a nuisance. However, this persistent discomfort can signal underlying health conditions. Experts explain that rest at night can worsen pain from muscle and joint degeneration, nerve issues, or gastrointestinal problems. Persistent nighttime pain, especially with other symptoms, requires medical attention. Ignoring this pain means the body's signals go unheard.

title: 'Border 2' crosses Rs 250 crore mark
content: Sunny Deol's 'Border 2' continues its phenomenal box office run, surpassing Rs 250 crore in just under 10 days. The war film saw a strong second Saturday, adding significantly to its impressive collections. Despite new competition, 'Border 2' has become the highest-grossing film of 2026, with global earnings nearing Rs 344 crore.

title: NHL Power Rankings: Updated 1-32 poll, each team's...
content: the calendar ticks one week closer to the start of the 2026 Olympic Games . a big February game upcoming has been identified for each club . previous ranking refers to the previous edition, published Jan. 23 . it's time for another set of ESPN NHL Power Rankings .

title: Why the LA Clippers are suddenly the hottest team ...
content: the LA Clippers beat the Pistons 112-99 in the premier league . assistant coach Brian Shaw doesn't like comparing anyone to Kobe Bryant . he's reluctantly an authority on the matter, but he sees shades of Bryant in recent play .

title: Could history repeat at Man United? Carrick and So...
content: the comparisons between the caretaker appointments of Ole Gunnar Solskjr and Michael Carrick are obvious . it might not end there, but the similarities are hard to escape . there are murmurings among excited supporters that United could already have the right man in the dugout .

title: Teofimo Lopez Jr.-Shakur Stevenson live updates, r...
content: Shakur Stevenson  became a four-division champion after defeating   Teofimo Lopez Jr.  by unanimous decision Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York. Stevenson, who moved up in weight to challenge Lopez and make his debut at junior welterweight, won by scorecards of 119-109, 119-109 and 119-109. Stevenson (25-0, 11 KOs) is now a world champion in a fourth division after previous titles at featherweight, junior lightweight and lightweight. He was coming off  a dominant victory over William Zepeda  in July. Lopez (22-2, 13 KOs) had won six straight fights since  his upset loss to George Kambosos Jr.  in 2021. A former unified lightweight champion, Lopez was making his fourth defense of the 140-pound belt he captured with a  unanimous decision win over Josh Taylor  in June 2023. Lopez also owns notable victories  over Vasiliy Lomachenko  in 2020 and  Arnold Barboza Jr. last May . Relive all the action, undercard results and round-by-round analysis from Andreas Hale.

title: Five teams with contract extension dilemmas
content: Marcus Spears is interested in George Pickens' free agent market this offseason . we're heading into contract extension season . some of these big deals are intertwined with others . a few teams with interesting extortion deals are also interested in the market .
